title.rendered: His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received on a courtesy visit, Dr. George D. Alabo.

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, His Excellency Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received on a courtesy visit, Dr. George D. Alabo, FNIQS, the newly appointed Executive Secretary of Border Communities Development Agency (BCDA) and his team today, 16th April, 2024.
Discussions centred on strengthening collaboration between the Ministry and the BCDA to promote development of border communities in line with the Development component of the 4-Ds Foreign Policy thrust of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu’s Administration. Furthermore, emphasis was placed on enhancing trans-border cooperation and security as part of the medium term strategic plan of BCDA.
